# Contributing to acwri

Thanks for your interest in acwri! This package is currently maintained by [Jixing](https://github.com/jixing475).

## Found a Bug?

If you've found a bug, please [open an issue](https://github.com/jixing475/acwri/issues/new) with a minimal reproducible example.

## Feature Requests

Have an idea for a new feature? Feel free to open an issue to discuss it.

## Code of Conduct

Please note that the acwri project is released with a [Contributor Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.
